mapper.select: SELECT r.id as reward_id, r.project_id as reward_project_id, r.title as reward_title, r.description as reward_description, r.amount as reward_amount, ri.id as ri_id, ri.reward_id as ri_reward_id, ri.quantity as ri_quantity, i.id as item_id, i.project_id as item_project_id, i.title as item_title FROM reward r LEFT OUTER JOIN reward_item ri on r.id = ri.reward_id JOIN item i on ri.item_id = i.id WHERE r.project_id = #{projectId}
